headline: Intrizen Named to 2025 Inc. 5000 List of America’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies
summary: NAPLES, Fla., September 18, 2025--Intrizen, SAP Partner, joins the 2025 Inc. 5000 for driving HR + IT + AI innovation and digital transformation, multiplying happier human connections.

content.title: Intrizen Named to 2025 Inc. 5000 List of America’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies
content.summary: NAPLES, Fla., September 18, 2025--Intrizen, SAP Partner, joins the 2025 Inc. 5000 for driving HR + IT + AI innovation and digital transformation, multiplying happier human connections.

thumbnail.caption: Intrizen has been named to the Inc. 5000 list of America’s fastest-growing private companies, recognizing its rapid growth and innovation in HR technology. As an official SAP Partner, Intrizen delivers human-centered HR + IT transformation powered by workflow automation and AI for People. The company is trusted by leading enterprises including American Airlines, Grainger, Lowe’s, and Worldwide Flight Services to modernize complex workforce systems, streamline operations, and elevate employee experiences. Known for multiplying happier human connections through digital transformation, Intrizen combines deep technical expertise with a people-first approach to help organizations adapt, scale, and thrive in a rapidly evolving digital era. Learn more at www.intrizen.com
